posts.post_content:
By investing some mana into Coat of Arms, you can use any of the combos listed here for a huge army of powerful defenders. Use the RotE enchantment to cause creatures to lose flying when attacking, and then throw down something that shares a type with this, and you're in business.  
  
Protean Hydra or Phytohydra would be my recommendations, by the way, though Phytohydra breaks the pure Green theme.
posts.html:
By investing some mana into Coat of Arms, you can use any of the combos listed here for a huge army of powerful defenders. Use the RotE enchantment to cause creatures to lose flying when attacking, and then throw down something that shares a type with this, and you're in business.

Protean Hydra or Phytohydra would be my recommendations, by the way, though Phytohydra breaks the pure Green theme.

posts.post_content:
This in a two-headed giant where the other player had [Tibor and Lumia](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tibor and Lumia). The pure amount of defenders produced made [Vent Sentinel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vent Sentinel) a real killer.  
The deck has now been improved with the addition of 4 [Blaze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blaze), 4 [Fireball](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fireball) and 4 [Overgrown Battlement](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overgrown Battlement).  
pplz r gonnan dies.

posts.post_content: @Garralan it's very easy to kill, actually. It dies to [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile), [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade), and any removal that deals no damage. The important part is to destroy it before the tokens get out of hand. Otherwise [Infest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infest), [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) can do the trick.
posts.html:
@Garralan it's very easy to kill, actually. It dies to Path to Exile, Doom Blade, and any removal that deals no damage. The important part is to destroy it before the tokens get out of hand. Otherwise Infest, Wrath of God can do the trick.
